TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AmbientAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AmbientAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AmbientAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定应将某个属性或类型视为环境。

span.span: Specifies that a property or type should be treated as ambient.

summary.span: 环境概念涉及 XAML 处理器如何确定成员的类型所有者。

span.span: The ambient concept relates to how XAML processors determine type owners of members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 环境属性是属性的值应为分析器上下文中可用时创建对象图，但其典型类型成员查找挂起直接 XAML 节点集创建的。An ambient property is a property where the value is expected to be available in the parser context when creating an object graph, but where typical type-member lookup is suspended for purposes of the immediate XAML node set being created. 有两个主要方案的环境概念：There are two main scenarios for the ambient concept: - 同一个对象的其他某个属性可能影响和限定对象属性查找的工作方式。Some other property of the same object influences and qualifies how that object-property lookup should work. - 该属性表示更大的延迟机制，用于查找成员值的环境功能扩展到包含当前对象的所有对象。The property represents a larger deferral mechanism and the ambient capabilities for looking up a member value extend to all objects contained within the current object. 此属性可应用于特定于希望启用的环境属性查找行为，容器的属性或可应用于类，以启用在所有情况下，该属性的值类型的环境属性行为。This attribute can be applied to specific properties that have expected containers that enable an ambient property lookup behavior, or can be applied to a class to enable the ambient property behavior in all cases of that value type for a property. 此外可以应用于 CLR 方法，以支持属性设置为环境的 XAML 可附加属性。 can also be applied to a CLR method, to support attributing a XAML attachable property as ambient. 这是可能有必要的因为在 CLR 实现的 XAML 附加的属性实现/表示作为一种访问器模式与反射`get`和`set`方法。This is potentially necessary because in a CLR implementation a XAML attached property is implemented/represented to reflection as an accessor pattern with `get` and `set` methods. 属性没有实际的 CLR 属性存在，因此限制的使用情况到`Property`会不允许指定可附加成员为环境。No actual CLR property to attribute exists, so restricting usage for to `Property` would not have enabled specifying an attachable member as ambient. 对于你想要报告为环境的可附加成员，请特性`get`访问器。For an attachable member that you want to report as ambient, attribute the `get` accessor. 您不应尝试属性不是专门支持方法的可附加成员的方法。You should not attempt to attribute methods that are not specifically support methods of attachable members. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类存在于 WindowsBase 的特定于 WPF 程序集。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). 环境类型 (类型 where在类型级别应用) 可用于某些 XAML 处理情况下，其中属性类型需要解析顺序。Ambient types (types where is applied at type level) can be used for certain XAML processing situations where the type of a property needs to be resolved out of order. ## 对象编写器方案Object Writer Scenarios 如果你正在定义的 XAML 对象编写器，但遇到属性、 方法或类型其中是应用，您通常必须访问的服务可以确定所需的写出对象的预期环境属性查找行为。If you are defining a XAML object writer, and you encounter a property, method or type where is applied, you typically must access a service to determine the intended ambient property lookup behavior that is needed for writing out objects. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## 值转换器Value Converters 类型转换器或标记扩展可能需要知道的环境的信息，才能处理表示间接类型映射，例如通过使用或不限定字符串名称来指定成员或类型的属性的属性。Type converters or markup extensions might need to know the ambient information in order to process properties that represent indirect type mappings, such as properties that specify members or types by string names with or without qualification. 在此方案中，不应直接用于值转换器代码逻辑。In this scenario, is not intended to be used directly for value converter code logic. 相反，值转换器应依赖于将传递的 XAML 编写器处理行为中其值转换器方法调用时使用的服务上下文。Rather, the value converter should rely on the XAML writer processing behavior, which will pass in its service contexts to your value converter methods when called. ## AmbientAttribute 的 WPF 方案WPF Scenarios for AmbientAttribute - 属性() 可以限定所需属性中的名称查找后备引用必要属性名称查找值。A property of a () can qualify the necessary property name lookups that are needed to find the backing references for property names in values. - 中的所有内容`Resources`属性 (项的) 以及模板的内容，应该能够访问其他对等节点作为值。All content within a `Resources` property (items of a ) as well as template content, should be able to access other peers as values. 声明整个`Resources`属性作为环境调用，这在 WPF XAML 分析器中的逻辑。Declaring the entire `Resources` property as ambient invokes logic that enables this in the WPF XAML parser. 请参阅有关的设置的方案示例在类型级别。See for an example of a scenario for setting at type level.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
